title: Empathetic Instructional Design for Enhancing Collaborative Competencies Among Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Role-Play and Discussion-Centered Program for Non-Majors in Medical Fields Using Real-World Case Studies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze communication barriers among medical team members with over 80% accuracy and propose solutions.
Learners implement strategies to creatively mediate collaborative conflicts three or more times in role-sharing simulations.
Learners submit actionable improvement plans based on real-world medical collaboration cases with 90% completion in the final project.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
